Plot: Detective Michael Tabb knows the city of St. Louis inside and out. He has felt its true heart, as much as its dark underbelly: but he does not know who, in both the dark and light - is taking the lives of young girls.
Title: A Fall from Grace
Writer: Jennifer Chambers Lynch, Eric Charles Wilkinson
Actors: Vincent D'Onofrio, David Lynch, Paz Vega, Tim Roth
